bill_title: define midwifery and to prescribe the relationship between midwives and nurse midwives.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to define midwifery and to prescribe the relationship between midwives and nurse midwives. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 36-9A-1 be amended by adding thereto NEW SUBDIVISIONS to read as follows: "Midwife," a woman who assists other women during pregnancy and childbirth; "Midwifery," the work of a midwife; "Non-nurse midwife," a midwife who is either not a nurse, or who, if she is a nurse, is not holding herself out as a nurse midwife practicing pursuant to § 36-9A-13. Section 2. That chapter 36-9A be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The provisions of this chapter do not apply to the practice of midwifery by any non-nurse midwife. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
